se.natusoft.tools.fileeditor.internal

Class BufferWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.natusoft.tools.fileeditor.internal.BufferWrapper

  • public class BufferWrapper
extends Object
    This wraps a TextBuffer and works with internal editor objects.

    Note that the TextBuffer interface works with base 0 indexes while this wrapper works with base 1 indexes as does the TextFileEditor!

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BufferWrapper(TextBuffer buffer)
      Creates a new instance of Position.

      • newInstance

        public BufferWrapper newInstance()
        Returns a new instance of the buffer.

        Some editor operations work by creating a new buffer. This method allows those operations to create a buffer of the same type.

        Please note however that any saved reference to the loaded file must be copied to the new instance before it is returned.

      • getOriginalBuffer

        public TextBuffer getOriginalBuffer()
        Returns the wrapped buffer.
